wikipedia_page.main: James John Clyde, Baron Clyde, PC (29 January 1932 – 6 March 2009) was a Scottish judge.

response: * James Clyde, Baron Clyde, Lord of Appeal in Ordinary
His son, James Clyde, Baron Clyde became a member of the Court of Session and latterly a Law Lord.
